00024 /***************************************************************************
00025         Interface for Instantiating any FunctionLib
00026  ***************************************************************************/
00027 
00028 #include "CosineFunction.h"
00029 #include "LinearFunction.h"
00030 #include "LowpassFunction.h"
00031 #include "PowerFunction.h"
00032 #include "TanhFunction.h"
00033 
00034 
00035 
00036 JamomaError jamoma_getFunction(t_symbol *functionName, FunctionLib **function)
00037 {       
00038         if(*function)
00039                 delete *function;
00040 
00041         // These should be alphabetized
00042         if(functionName == gensym("cosine"))
00043                 *function = (FunctionLib*) new CosineFunction;
00044         else if(functionName == gensym("linear"))
00045                 *function = (FunctionLib*) new LinearFunction;
00046         else if(functionName == gensym("lowpass"))
00047                 *function = (FunctionLib*) new LowpassFunction;
00048         else if(functionName == gensym("power"))
00049                 *function = (FunctionLib*) new PowerFunction;
00050         else if(functionName == gensym("tanh"))
00051                 *function = (FunctionLib*) new TanhFunction;
00052 
00053         else {
00054                 // Invalid function specified default to linear
00055                 error("rampLib: Invalid function: %s", functionName->s_name);
00056                 *function = (FunctionLib*) new LinearFunction;
00057         }
00058         
00059         return JAMOMA_ERR_NONE;
00060 }
00061 
00062 
00063 void jamoma_getFunctionList(long *numFunctions, t_symbol ***functionNames)
00064 {
00065         *numFunctions = 5;
00066         *functionNames = (t_symbol**)sysmem_newptr(sizeof(t_symbol*) * *numFunctions);
00067         
00068         // These should be alphabetized
00069         if(*functionNames){
00070                 *(*functionNames+0) = gensym("cosine");
00071                 *(*functionNames+1) = gensym("linear");
00072                 *(*functionNames+2) = gensym("lowpass");
00073                 *(*functionNames+3) = gensym("power");
00074                 *(*functionNames+4) = gensym("tanh");
00075         }
00076 }

00080 /***************************************************************************
00081         Utilities shared by various members of the FunctionLib
00082  ***************************************************************************/
00083 
00084 double jamoma_anti_denormal(double value)
00085 {
00086         value += k_anti_denormal_value;
00087         value -= k_anti_denormal_value;
00088         return(value);
00089 }
